title: CEO, the Board of Directors, and Corporate Governance
description: Provides an understanding of relationships among shareholders, managers, and boards. Focuses on the office of the chief executive officer and on the board of directors, including the roles and responsibilities of directors, and the legal, economic, managerial, and psychological issues they confront. Students may not earn credit for both MGT 421 and MGT 211. They are course equivalents. Prerequisites: MBA student or consent of instructor and department stamp.
